org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ParentUiElement
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actionable, Hoverable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageButton, TabButton, TextButton

    public class Button
extends ParentUiElement
implements Actionable
    A button implementation that stores child elements such as Label, Image, etc.
